subject: URGENT: Verify your account immediately
body: Your account has been locked due to suspicious activity. Click here to verify your identity within 24 hours or your account will be permanently deleted.

metadata.notes: Phishing attempt with urgency and fake threat

subject: Congratulations! You've won $1,000,000
body: You have been selected as the winner of our international lottery. To claim your prize, please provide your bank details and pay a small processing fee of $500.

subject: Limited time offer - 90% discount on all products!
body: Buy now and save thousands! This offer expires in 2 hours. Click here to shop. Unbelievable deals you can't miss!

subject: Your package is waiting for pickup
body: A package addressed to you could not be delivered. Click the link below to reschedule delivery and confirm your address details.

subject: IRS Tax Refund Notification
body: You are eligible for a tax refund of $3,247. To process your refund, please verify your information by clicking the secure link below.

subject: Board meeting rescheduled to tomorrow 2pm
body: Due to scheduling conflicts, the Q4 board review meeting has been moved to tomorrow at 2:00 PM in Conference Room A. Please confirm your attendance.

subject: URGENT: Production server outage
body: The main production server is experiencing downtime. All hands needed for immediate investigation and resolution. Join the emergency call now.

subject: Client contract requires immediate signature
body: The Johnson Industries contract is ready for final signature. The client needs this signed by end of day to proceed with the project launch next week.

subject: Security alert: Unauthorized access attempt
body: We detected an unauthorized login attempt to your corporate account from an unfamiliar location. Please review the security logs and update your password immediately.

subject: Payroll processing deadline - action required
body: Please submit your timesheet corrections by 3 PM today. Any submissions after this deadline will be processed in the next pay cycle.

subject: Weekly team newsletter - January 2025
body: Here's this week's roundup of team achievements, upcoming events, and interesting articles from around the web. Enjoy your weekend!

subject: Office kitchen cleaning schedule
body: Reminder that kitchen cleaning duties rotate weekly. This week's schedule is posted on the bulletin board.

subject: New blog post: 10 Tips for Better Code Reviews
body: Check out our latest engineering blog post about improving code review practices. We'd love to hear your thoughts in the comments.

subject: Lunch and learn next Thursday
body: Join us next Thursday for a lunch and learn session about microservices architecture. Pizza will be provided. RSVP optional.

subject: Weather forecast for the week
body: This week's weather: Monday through Wednesday will be sunny with highs in the 70s. Rain expected Thursday and Friday.
